channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [OOZIE-2750] Spelling errors in the log messages and exception messages
item.description: Found a bunch of spelling errors in the log messages like 'ugprade' for 'upgrade' and 'kerberoes' for 'kerberos'.
item.summary: Spelling errors in the log messages and exception messages

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Fixes spelling errors in logging and exceptions.
